pages.text: $(l)(Active-Offensive)/$$(br)Spyglasses will scout tiles in a line, revealing whether or not any ships are located in those tiles. They always scout perpendicular to the direction your controller faces in (left to right, never up/down). Each spyglass has one stat: Length. The length determines how many tiles are targeted by the ability. When selecting the deployment tile, be aware that this length is centered around

that tile. This means that if you select a tile too close to the edge of the board, the ability may target less tiles than its length indicates.$(br2)$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Spyglasses can be useful for scouting early on.$(li)Spyglasses excel at setting up devastating combos, as you can continue to move after using the ability regardless of whether or not it actually found any ships.

You can use the spyglass ability to severly decrease the chances that your other abilities miss if they target that tile, since you already know that there is a ship there (just be aware that things like $(l:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(thing)Energy Shields)/$ may still block your attack.$(li)The ability will mark all target tiles that contain a ship with a 'Ship Here' block (looks like a red exclamation mark). This block disappears if the tile it sits above is damaged!
